list.name: Online
list.rawQuery:
SELECT
  "onlineTime" as "time",
  "offlineTime" as "timeend",
  CASE WHEN "onlineTime"="offlineTime" THEN 'Car sent update'
            ELSE 'Car went online (' || ("offlineTime"-"onlineTime") || ')'
  END AS "text"
FROM
  onlinestates
WHERE
  vehicle_vin = '$VIN' and
  ($__timeFilter("onlineTime") OR $__timeFilter("offlineTime"))

list.name: Climatization
list.rawQuery:
SELECT "time",
       "timeend",
       'Climatization on ('
              || ("timeend"-"time")
              || ')' AS "text"
FROM   (
                SELECT   *,
                         "carCapturedTimestamp"                                           AS "time",
                         Lag("climatisationState") OVER (ORDER BY "carCapturedTimestamp") AS "beforeClimatisationState",
                         (
                                  SELECT   "carCapturedTimestamp" AS "timeend"
                                  FROM     climatization          AS climatization2
                                  WHERE    climatization2."climatisationState" = 'OFF'
                                  AND      climatization.vehicle_vin = climatization2.vehicle_vin
                                  AND      climatization."carCapturedTimestamp" < climatization2."carCapturedTimestamp"
                                  ORDER BY "carCapturedTimestamp" limit 1) "timeend"
                FROM     climatization
                WHERE    vehicle_vin = '$VIN') AS data
WHERE  "climatisationState" != 'OFF'
AND ("timeend"-"time") < INTERVAL '1 hour'
AND    "beforeClimatisationState" = 'OFF'
AND ($__timeFilter("time") OR $__timeFilter("timeend"))

list.name: Charging
list.rawQuery:
SELECT "time",
       "timeend",
       'Charging ('
              || ("timeend"-"time")
              || ')' AS "text"
FROM   (
                SELECT   *,
                         "carCapturedTimestamp"                                           AS "time",
                         Lag("chargingState") OVER (ORDER BY "carCapturedTimestamp") AS "beforeChargingState",
                         (
                                  SELECT   "carCapturedTimestamp" AS "timeend"
                                  FROM     charges          AS charges2
                                  WHERE    charges2."chargingState" != 'CHARGING'
                                  AND      charges.vehicle_vin = charges2.vehicle_vin
                                  AND      charges."carCapturedTimestamp" < charges2."carCapturedTimestamp"
                                  ORDER BY "carCapturedTimestamp" limit 1) "timeend"
                FROM     charges
                WHERE    vehicle_vin = '${VIN}'
                ) AS data
WHERE  "chargingState" = 'CHARGING'
AND ("timeend"-"time") < INTERVAL '1 day'
AND    "beforeChargingState" != 'CHARGING'
AND ($__timeFilter("time") OR $__timeFilter("timeend"))

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "carCapturedTimestamp" AS "time",
  "currentSOC_pct" AS "Battery SoC"
FROM battery
WHERE
  vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY "time" DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT
  "carCapturedTimestamp" AS "time",
  "cruisingRangeElectric_km" AS "Electric Range"
FROM battery
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("carCapturedTimestamp") AND
  vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "carCapturedTimestamp" AS "time",
  "currentSOC_pct" AS "Battery SoC"
FROM battery
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("carCapturedTimestamp") AND
  vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "lastUpdate" AS "time",
  CASE WHEN "online"=True THEN 1
       WHEN "online"=False THEN 0
  END as "online"
FROM vehicles
WHERE
  vin = '$VIN'

SELECT
  "lastUpdate" AS "Last update from Server",
  "lastChange" AS "Last update from Car"
FROM vehicles
WHERE
  vin = '$VIN'

(SELECT
  to_timestamp(0) AS "time",
  CASE WHEN vehicles."carType" = 'ELECTRIC' THEN vehicle_settings."primary_wltp_range"::NUMERIC
  ELSE vehicle_settings."secondary_wltp_range"::NUMERIC END AS "Electric Range"
FROM vehicles
LEFT JOIN vehicle_settings ON vehicles.vin = vehicle_settings.vehicle_vin
WHERE
  vehicles.vin = '$VIN')
UNION
(SELECT
  "carCapturedTimestamp" AS "time",
  "cruisingRangeElectric_km" AS "Electric Range"
FROM battery
WHERE
  battery.vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY "time" DESC
LIMIT 1)

(SELECT
  to_timestamp(0) AS "time",
  MAX("remainingClimatisationTime_min")
FROM climatization
WHERE
  vehicle_vin = '$VIN')
UNION
(SELECT
  "carCapturedTimestamp" AS "time",
  CASE WHEN "climatisationState" != 'OFF' THEN "remainingClimatisationTime_min"
  ELSE 0 END
FROM climatization
WHERE
  vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY "time" DESC
LIMIT 1)

SELECT
  "carCapturedTimestamp" AS "time",
  "totalRange_km" AS "Total Range"
FROM ranges
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("carCapturedTimestamp") AND
  vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "carCapturedTimestamp" AS "time",
  "primary_currentSOC_pct" AS "Primary Engine SoC"
FROM ranges
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("carCapturedTimestamp") AND
  vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "carCapturedTimestamp" AS "time",
  "primary_remainingRange_km" AS "Primary Engine Range"
FROM ranges
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("carCapturedTimestamp") AND
  vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "carCapturedTimestamp" AS "time",
  "secondary_currentSOC_pct" AS "Secondary Engine SoC"
FROM ranges
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("carCapturedTimestamp") AND
  vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "carCapturedTimestamp" AS "time",
  "secondary_remainingRange_km" AS "Secondary Engine Range"
FROM ranges
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("carCapturedTimestamp") AND
  vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "carCapturedTimestamp" AS "time",
  "chargePower_kW"
FROM charges
WHERE
  vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY "time" DESC
LIMIT 1

(SELECT
  to_timestamp(0) AS "time",
  MAX("remainingChargingTimeToComplete_min")
FROM charges
WHERE
  vehicle_vin = '$VIN')
UNION
(SELECT
  "carCapturedTimestamp" AS "time",
  "remainingChargingTimeToComplete_min"
FROM charges
WHERE
  vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY "time" DESC
LIMIT 1)

SELECT
  $__time("carCapturedTimestamp"),
  CASE WHEN "currentSOC_pct"::NUMERIC > 0 THEN "cruisingRangeElectric_km"::NUMERIC / "currentSOC_pct"::NUMERIC * 100::NUMERIC END AS "Current Range at 100%",
  CASE WHEN "currentSOC_pct"::NUMERIC = 0 OR "cruisingRangeElectric_km"::NUMERIC = 0 THEN NULL
       WHEN vehicles."carType" = 'ELECTRIC' THEN vehicle_settings."primary_capacity"::NUMERIC
  ELSE vehicle_settings."secondary_capacity"::NUMERIC END / ("cruisingRangeElectric_km"::NUMERIC / "currentSOC_pct"::NUMERIC * 100::NUMERIC) * 100::NUMERIC AS "Calculated consumption"
FROM
  battery
LEFT JOIN vehicles ON battery.vehicle_vin = vehicles.vin
LEFT JOIN vehicle_settings ON battery.vehicle_vin = vehicle_settings.vehicle_vin
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("carCapturedTimestamp") AND
  battery.vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  unnest(ARRAY[to_timestamp(${__from}/1000), to_timestamp(${__to}/1000)]) AS time,
  CASE WHEN vehicles."carType" = 'ELECTRIC' THEN vehicle_settings."primary_wltp_range"::NUMERIC
  ELSE vehicle_settings."secondary_wltp_range"::NUMERIC END AS "WLTP"
FROM
  vehicles
LEFT JOIN vehicle_settings ON vehicles.vin = vehicle_settings.vehicle_vin
WHERE
  vehicles.vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__time("carCapturedTimestamp"),
  ("cruisingRangeElectric_km"::NUMERIC / "currentSOC_pct"::NUMERIC * 100::NUMERIC) / 
    CASE WHEN vehicles."carType" = 'ELECTRIC' THEN vehicle_settings."primary_wltp_range"::NUMERIC
         ELSE vehicle_settings."secondary_wltp_range"::NUMERIC END * 100::NUMERIC AS "Efficiency"
FROM
  battery
LEFT JOIN vehicles ON battery.vehicle_vin = vehicles.vin
LEFT JOIN vehicle_settings ON battery.vehicle_vin = vehicle_settings.vehicle_vin
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("carCapturedTimestamp") AND
  battery.vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  unnest(ARRAY[to_timestamp(${__from}/1000), to_timestamp(${__to}/1000)]) AS time,
  100 AS "100% = WLTP Range"
FROM
  vehicles
LEFT JOIN vehicle_settings ON vehicles.vin = vehicle_settings.vehicle_vin
WHERE
  vehicles.vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY 1

(SELECT
  "carCapturedTimestamp" AS "time",
  "chargePower_kW" AS "Charge Power",
  "chargeRate_kmph" AS "Charge Rate"
FROM charges
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("carCapturedTimestamp") AND
  vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY "carCapturedTimestamp")
UNION ALL
(SELECT
  "carCapturedTimestamp" AS "time",
  CASE WHEN "chargingState" = 'CHARGING' THEN "delta"::decimal*( CASE WHEN vehicles."carType" = 'ELECTRIC' THEN vehicle_settings."primary_capacity"::NUMERIC
  ELSE vehicle_settings."secondary_capacity"::NUMERIC END::decimal/100::decimal) / (EXTRACT(epoch FROM "timedelta") / 3600)
  ELSE NULL END AS "Charge Power",
  CASE WHEN "chargingState" = 'CHARGING' THEN "deltakm"::decimal / (EXTRACT(epoch FROM "timedelta") / 3600)
  ELSE NULL END AS "Charge Rate"
FROM
  (SELECT *,
  DATE_TRUNC('minute', "carCapturedTimestamp") AS "batteryTime",
  ("carCapturedTimestamp" - LAG("carCapturedTimestamp") OVER (ORDER BY "carCapturedTimestamp")) AS "timedelta",
  ("currentSOC_pct" - LAG("currentSOC_pct") OVER (ORDER BY "carCapturedTimestamp")) AS "delta",
  ("cruisingRangeElectric_km" - LAG("cruisingRangeElectric_km") OVER (ORDER BY "carCapturedTimestamp")) AS "deltakm"
FROM
  battery
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("carCapturedTimestamp") AND
  vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY "carCapturedTimestamp") AS delta
LEFT JOIN
(
SELECT
"chargingState",
DATE_TRUNC('minute', charges."carCapturedTimestamp") AS "chargeTime"
FROM charges
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("carCapturedTimestamp") AND
  vehicle_vin = '$VIN') as charging ON "chargeTime" = "batteryTime"
LEFT JOIN vehicles ON delta.vehicle_vin = vehicles.vin
LEFT JOIN vehicle_settings ON delta.vehicle_vin = vehicle_settings.vehicle_vin
WHERE
  "delta" > 0 AND
  NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM charges WHERE "chargePower_kW" IS NOT NULL AND "chargeRate_kmph" IS NOT NULL AND $__timeFilter("carCapturedTimestamp") AND vehicle_vin = '$VIN' LIMIT 1)
ORDER BY "carCapturedTimestamp")

(SELECT
  "onlineTime" AS "time",
  'online' AS "Online"
FROM onlinestates
WHERE
  "onlineTime" != "offlineTime" AND
  $__timeFilter("onlineTime") AND
  vehicle_vin = '$VIN')
UNION ALL
(SELECT
  "offlineTime" AS "time",
  'offline' AS "state"
FROM onlinestates
WHERE
  "onlineTime" != "offlineTime" AND
  $__timeFilter("offlineTime") AND
  vehicle_vin = '$VIN')
ORDER BY "time"

SELECT
  "carCapturedTimestamp" AS "time",
  "climatisationState" AS "Climatization"
FROM climatization
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("carCapturedTimestamp") AND
  vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "carCapturedTimestamp" AS "time",
  "chargingState" AS "Charging"
FROM charges
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("carCapturedTimestamp") AND
  vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY 1

list.description: Select Car if you have multiple cars in your account
list.label: Car
list.name: VIN
